column1: Swallowing, breathing in the product, or spraying it in the eyes can be potentially dangerous.

Airways and lungs: - Breathing difficulty (from inhalation) - Throat swelling (may also cause breathing difficulty) Eyes, ears, nose, and throat: - Severe pain in the throat - Severe pain or burning in the nose, eyes, ears, lips, or tongue - Vision loss Gastrointestinal: - Abdominal pain -- severe - Bloody stools - Burns of the esophagus (food pipe) - Vomiting, possibly with blood Heart and blood: - Collapse - Low blood pressure -- develops rapidly - Severe change in blood acid levels -- leads to organ damage Nervous system: - Coma (decreased level of consciousness and lack of responsiveness) - Stupor Skin: - Burns - Irritation - Necrosis (holes) in the skin or underlying tissues
